verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶ֧ל <S%H413><s%> and to אֶלְעָזָ֛ר <S%H499><s%> and unto Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שְׂא֞וּ <S%H5375><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֣אשׁ ׀ <S%H7218><s%> the sum כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> of all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> throughout their fathers' כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that are able to go צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <S%H499><s%> and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֹתָ֖ם <S%H854><s%> in בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> with them in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [Take the sum of the people] from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> Moses וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the eldest יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> son of Israel בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children רְאוּבֵ֗ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben חֲנוֹךְ֙ <S%H2585><s%> Hanoch מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> [of whom cometh] the family הַחֲנֹכִ֔י <S%H2599><s%> of the Hanochites לְפַלּ֕וּא <S%H6396><s%> of Pallu מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַפַּלֻּאִֽי׃ <S%H6384><s%> of the Palluites

לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <S%H2696><s%> Of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַֽחֶצְרוֹנִ֑י <S%H2697><s%> of the Hezronites לְכַרְמִ֕י <S%H3756><s%> of Carmi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַכַּרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3757><s%> of the Carmites

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families הָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֑י <S%H7206><s%> of the Reubenites וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become פְקֻדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6485><s%> and they that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> and three וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> of them were forty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> and seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7970><s%> and thirty
וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons פַלּ֖וּא <S%H6396><s%> of Pallu אֱלִיאָֽב׃ <S%H446><s%> Eliab

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֱלִיאָ֔ב <S%H446><s%> of Eliab נְמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H5241><s%> Nemuel וְדָתָ֣ן <S%H1885><s%> and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֑ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> These דָתָ֨ן <S%H1885><s%> This [is that] Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <S%H48><s%> and Abiram [קְרוּאֵי כ] (קְרִיאֵ֣י <S%H7148><s%> famous ק) הָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> in the congregation אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הִצּ֜וּ <S%H5327><s%> who strove עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> and against Aaron בַּעֲדַת־ <S%H5712><s%> in the company קֹ֔רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah בְּהַצֹּתָ֖ם <S%H5327><s%> when they strove עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD

וַתִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> opened הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֗יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth וַתִּבְלַ֥ע <S%H1104><s%> and swallowed them up אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with קֹ֖רַח <S%H7141><s%> together with Korah בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> died הָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> when that company בַּאֲכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> devoured הָאֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> what time the fire אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3967><s%> two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> became לְנֵֽס׃ <S%H5251><s%> and they became a sign
וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> Notwithstanding the children קֹ֖רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> died ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons שִׁמְעוֹן֮ <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> after their families לִנְמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H5241><s%> of Nemuel מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> the family הַנְּמ֣וּאֵלִ֔י <S%H5242><s%> of the Nemuelites לְיָמִ֕ין <S%H3226><s%> of Jamin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַיָּמִינִ֑י <S%H3228><s%> of the Jaminites לְיָכִ֕ין <S%H3199><s%> of Jachin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַיָּכִינִֽי׃ <S%H3200><s%> of the Jachinites

לְזֶ֕רַח <S%H2226><s%> Of Zerah מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַזַּרְחִ֑י <S%H2227><s%> of the Zarhites לְשָׁא֕וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Shaul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַשָּׁאוּלִֽי׃ <S%H7587><s%> of the Shaulites

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֑י <S%H8099><s%> of the Simeonites שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> and two hundred ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children גָד֮ <S%H1410><s%> of Gad לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> after their families לִצְפ֗וֹן <S%H6827><s%> of Zephon מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> the family הַצְּפוֹנִ֔י <S%H6831><s%> of the Zephonites לְחַגִּ֕י <S%H2291><s%> of Haggi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַֽחַגִּ֑י <S%H2291><s%> of the Haggites לְשׁוּנִ֕י <S%H7764><s%> of Shuni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַשּׁוּנִֽי׃ <S%H7765><s%> of the Shunites

לְאָזְנִ֕י <S%H244><s%> Of Ozni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הָאָזְנִ֑י <S%H244><s%> of the Oznites לְעֵרִ֕י <S%H6179><s%> of Eri מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הָעֵרִֽי׃ <S%H6180><s%> of the Erites

לַאֲר֕וֹד <S%H720><s%> Of Arod מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הָאֲרוֹדִ֑י <S%H722><s%> of the Arodites לְאַ֨רְאֵלִ֔י <S%H692><s%> of Areli מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הָאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H692><s%> of the Arelites

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> according to those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> of them forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred ס

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֵ֣ר <S%H6147><s%> [were] Er וְאוֹנָ֑ן <S%H209><s%> and Onan וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> died עֵ֛ר <S%H6147><s%> and Er וְאוֹנָ֖ן <S%H209><s%> and Onan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְהוּדָה֮ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְשֵׁלָ֗ה <S%H7956><s%> were of Shelah מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> the family הַשֵּׁ֣לָנִ֔י <S%H8024><s%> of the Shelanites לְפֶ֕רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַפַּרְצִ֑י <S%H6558><s%> of the Pharzites לְזֶ֕רַח <S%H2226><s%> of Zerah מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַזַּרְחִֽי׃ <S%H2227><s%> of the Zarhites

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons פֶ֔רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <S%H2696><s%> were of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַֽחֶצְרֹנִ֑י <S%H2697><s%> of the Hezronites לְחָמ֕וּל <S%H2538><s%> of Hamul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הֶחָמוּלִֽי׃ <S%H2539><s%> of the Hamulites

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> according to those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> six וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred ס

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> [Of] the sons יִשָּׂשכָר֙ <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families תּוֹלָ֕ע <S%H8439><s%> [of] Tola מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַתּוֹלָעִ֑י <S%H8440><s%> of the Tolaites לְפֻוָ֕ה <S%H6312><s%> of Pua מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַפּוּנִֽי׃ <S%H6324><s%> of the Punites

לְיָשׁ֕וּב <S%H3437><s%> Of Jashub מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַיָּשׁוּבִ֑י <S%H3432><s%> of the Jashubites לְשִׁמְרֹ֕ן <S%H8110><s%> of Shimron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַשִּׁמְרֹנִֽי׃ <S%H8117><s%> of the Shimronites

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> according to those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> and four וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <S%H8346><s%> of them threescore אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [Of] the sons זְבוּלֻן֮ <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְסֶ֗רֶד <S%H5624><s%> of Sered מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> the family הַסַּרְדִּ֔י <S%H5625><s%> of the Sardites לְאֵל֕וֹן <S%H356><s%> of Elon מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הָאֵלֹנִ֑י <S%H440><s%> of the Elonites לְיַ֨חְלְאֵ֔ל <S%H3177><s%> of Jahleel מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַיַּחְלְאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H3178><s%> of the Jahleelites

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families הַזְּבוּלֹנִ֖י <S%H2075><s%> of the Zebulunites לִפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> according to those that were numbered שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> of them threescore אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred ס
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> [were] Manasseh וְאֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לְמָכִיר֙ <S%H4353><s%> of Machir מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַמָּכִירִ֔י <S%H4354><s%> of the Machirites וּמָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> and Machir הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לְגִלְעָ֕ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> [come] the family הַגִּלְעָדִֽי׃ <S%H1569><s%> of the Gileadites
